org.pentaho.di.core.database
Class RemedyActionRequestSystemDatabaseMeta

java.lang.Object
  org.pentaho.di.core.database.BaseDatabaseMeta
      org.pentaho.di.core.database.GenericDatabaseMeta
          org.pentaho.di.core.database.RemedyActionRequestSystemDatabaseMeta
All Implemented Interfaces:
Cloneable, DatabaseInterface
public class RemedyActionRequestSystemDatabaseMeta
extends GenericDatabaseMeta
implements DatabaseInterface

Contains Database Connection information through static final members for a BMW Remedy Action Request System. These connections are typically read-only ODBC only.

Since:
11-Sep-2007
Author:
Matt
